youtube-dl -i --geo-bypass --yes-playlist -x --audio-format mp3 --embed-thumbnail --add-metadata -a '~/self/youtube_process_link_list.txt' -o '~/Music/%(title)s.%(ext)s'

# -i: ignore errors
# --geo-bypass
# --playlist-start NUMBER
# --dateafter: dowload only videos uploaded on or after this date
# --yes-playlist: dolwoad playlist if url is ambigious
# -- output Template: Output filename template, see the OUTPUT TEMPLATE for all the info
# --write-thumbnail
# -f FORMATL veifor format code
# --write-sub: write subtitle file
# --write-auto-sub write automatically generated subtitle file
# --al-subs dowlaod all the avialable subtitles of the vido
# --username USERNAME
# -x: convert viedo files to audio-only
# --audio-fomat FORMAT
# --embed-thumbnail: embed thumbnail into audio as cover art
# --add-metadata
